settings.title: Functional Pottery
settings.text: Beautiful pieces designed for daily use. Each item is food-safe, microwave and dishwasher safe, and built to last for years of daily enjoyment.

settings.title: Food Safe & Durable
settings.text: All functional pieces are fired to stoneware temperatures (2200°F) making them completely food-safe and durable for daily use.

settings.title: Microwave & Dishwasher Safe
settings.text: Designed for modern living - all pieces are safe for microwave, dishwasher, and oven use up to 400°F.

settings.title: Unique & Handmade
settings.text: Each piece is individually thrown on the pottery wheel, making every item one-of-a-kind with its own character.

settings.title: Care Instructions
settings.text:
Daily Care: Safe for dishwasher, microwave, and oven use. Avoid extreme temperature changes.

Storage: Stack carefully with soft cloth or paper towels between pieces to prevent scratching.

Cleaning: For stubborn stains, use baking soda paste. Avoid abrasive cleaners that could damage the glaze.

settings.title: Size Guide
settings.text:
Mugs: 10-12 oz capacity, 3.5" diameter
Bowls: 16-20 oz capacity, 5-6" diameter
Plates: 8-10" diameter, perfect for meals
Serving Pieces: Varied sizes for different needs

All measurements are approximate as each piece is individually handmade. Slight variations in size and shape are part of the handmade character.
